dialog.text: The top half is sky. There is a mountain range that goes about halfway into the lower half
Below the mountains is all hills. They even go into the mountain a little bit on the right side
I did what you told me to do, but it doesn't look visually coherent. Might be a problem with the drawing application.
Okay there's some clouds right above the mountains but only on the right side.
The clouds are finished. Are there any other details about my image that I could change?
The mountain gets taller on the edge of the right side
Done. I'm assuming there are no major details that have been left out?
No, there is just some shrubbery. There is two very small patches of trees on the right side. They are about a fourth of the way up from the bottom
Okay now there is a few patches of grass right under those trees
I added the patches of grass under the trees.
Okay, you're basically done. Just make sure the cloud on the right is touching the mountain.
The cloud is already touching the mountain on the right side
